[in]lstVals/ Vector integer values associated to the options defined in lstNames.

void nextlimit::rf_sdk::GuiFormDialog::setTitle ( const std::string &  title)

setTitle:

Set the title of the dialog

OpResult nextlimit::rf_sdk::GuiFormDialog::show ( )

show:

Show the dialog and wait until the OK or Cancel buttons are pressed or until the dialog is dismissed using the ESC key.

Returns:
: GUI_DIALOG_ACCEPTED if the user pressed the OK button, GUI_DIALOG_REJECTED if the user pressed the Cancel button or the ESC key was hit.
